name: Scrutinized
contentDescriptors:
This game revolves around reading fiction reports of suspicious people filed by concerned citizens. With these reports the context sometimes resolves around sensitive matters such as murder, kidnapping, abuse, assault. 

The game also has mechanics in which players crack into cell phones in which the player can view images and text conversations of the suspicious person. These images can contain blood.

Please note that the people in this game are 100% creations of fiction, Their pictures are A.I generated, and any images found in the game are fabricated or stock images.
